main event: A shiny round object was observed moving horizontally across the sky at high speed in Helsinki, Finland, and Stockholm, Sweden.
interesting points: The object was observed crossing the city in a few seconds,It was estimated to be about 15-20 meters in diameter,The object traveled westward at an estimated direction of 200Â°,The sighting lasted approximately 1 second before it disappeared behind clouds,Dr. Robinson of ATIC believed it was probably a meteor.
witness description: a single observer who noted the object's appearance
